column5: Sports fans will be pleased to discover the convenient location near popular venues, such as Globe Life Park - home of the Texas Rangers, and AT&T Stadium, the world-class event center for the Dallas Cowboys. For a different type of thrill, make the short 12 minute drive to Six Flags over Texas, or cool off at Hurricane Harbor. This property is also a short walk away from the University Texas at Arlington, great for anyone Parents visiting the school or attending graduations.
